problem.markdown:
Which of the following are two-way modes of work?
[x] A cylinder-piston arrangement with the system and the surrounding system at (nearly) equal pressure.
[ ] A cell that cannot be recharged sending charge through a circuit.
[x] A rechargeable cell sending charge through a circuit . [ ] A rotating stirrer moving the fluid inside a system.
problem.p: Which of the following are two-way modes of work?
